Question: It includes words that this person wrote and the story of her life up to age 21, and was written during her time in college.
Hints: There are streets named after this person in Getafe, Spain, in Lod, Israel, in Lisbon, Portugal and in Caen, France.
Her birthday on June 27 is commemorated as this person Day in the U.S.
Due to a protruding left eye, this person was usually photographed in profile.
